title: Spaghetti with kale, anchovies and chilli
description: The beauty of this super-cheap dish is that with very few ingredients you get lots of flavour. Simple and stylish!Each serving provides 441kcal, 21g protein, 73g carbohydrate (of which 3g sugars),	5g fat (of which 0.8g saturates), 8g fibre and 3.8g salt.
ingredients: 75g/2½oz kale (or spring greens or dark green cabbage), roughly chopped
25g/1oz tinned anchovies in oil, chopped, oil reserved
1 garlic clove, chopped, grated or crushed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
